segments.advisor_message: So, as we start discussing your retirement plans, what specific goals do you have in mind for this stage of your life?
segments.client_message: Um, well, I guess I've always kinda thought about, like, traveling more, you know? Maybe hitting up Europe or, like, taking a long road trip across the US. And then, there's the whole, you know, relaxing on the beach thing, right? Just enjoying life and not having to worry about work or anything like that. I want to really make the most of my time!

segments.advisor_message: That sounds fantastic! Travel and relaxation are definitely great goals. Do you have any specific places or experiences you'd like to prioritize?
segments.client_message: Oh, definitely! Like I said, Europe has been a dream forever—so, uh, maybe—France, Italy, and those spots—but also like, when I think about it, uh, I wanna spend time with family too. Just sipping drinks somewhere sunny, you know? Bringing everyone together, I guess that's, like, super important for me too.
